description:
Takeru gets a Maken! The secret history of Makenki! A dangerous new threat! But most important, the girls of the Security Committee don their skimpiest outfits and get jobs at the local maid café in order to pay for their bikini-filled summer camp.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une journée d`animation spéciale au café Macaron
まかろん限定サービスデー
